Hello Keys-To-Go 2.  Our latest drop with ultimate portability, unbeatable battery life, and designed for sustainability. Absolute freedom to do more, on your tablet, your phone.

Any screen. Multi-OS. Anywhere. Learn more: https://logi.link/wou6n5
I just had my sketch done with the Logitech MX Ink for Quest and OMG IT MATCHED MY FACE

Keys-To-Go 2 has arrived, featuring a brand NEW ultra-slim design. The Ultimate multi-OS, super light keyboard with a modern aesthetic, built in cover, easy-switch, and 36 months of battery life. Powerfully portable. Any screen.

Tap for more: https://logi.link/wou6n5

We are happy to reveal our partnership with
@Logitech
which has just announced the #MXInk: the first #Mixedreality stylus for the #MetaQuest.

The pen-like form factor makes it perfect for creative and collaborative applications like ShapesXR.

Users can write and sketch

Not sure if this article got posted too early but Logitech is making a pen accessory for Meta Quest and/or Horizon OS headsets called the MX Ink.

Interestingly, it's natively supported on the OS and is tracked as a third "controller" which is a first for the Quest ecosystem.

I'm thrilled to share something that's been in the works!

Tomorrow, I will be at
@Logitech
HQ in Switzerland announcing something special

Stay tuned to see how we are helping young girls reach for the stars and see their future in #STEM

#Logitech #WomenWhoMaster
